value:
$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|You.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Are you a soldier from the realm of
the dead?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|My name is Líf.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Líf?$k$pYou can't be...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Alfonse? What's wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Tremble before Sökkvabekkr, the
sword of ruin...as I destroy this world.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The enemy has vanished...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Líf...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Do you know him?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We've never met. But his name is
very familiar to me. I've read it in so
many books...$k$pYou should recognize it, too. Líf is
the progenitor of the Askran royal
family—and a true king.$k$pHe formed a pact with the Divine
Dragon Askr and gained the power
to open gates to other realms...$k$pLíf, the first king of Askr...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The first king? He can't still be alive
today, can he?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Of course not. But if we are fighting
the dead...$k$pWell, then we may encounter an
ancestor or two.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|And fight them, it seems.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|King Líf united Askr and became a
true Hero, thanks to the power of the
dragon's blood...$k$p$EFace_Anger|You can't measure the power of a
man like that. In the battles we face
now...we must be careful.$k$p$Sbs150|
